verses.verse: Judge <WH8199> me, O God, <WH430> and plead <WH7378> my cause <WH7379> against an ungodly <WH3808> <WH2623> nation: <WH1471> O deliver <WH6403> me from the deceitful <WH4820> and unjust <WH5766> man. <WH376>
For you are the God <WH430> of my strength: <WH4581> why <WH4100> do you cast <WH2186> me off? why <WH4100> go <WH1980> I mourning <WH6937> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy? <WH341>
O send <WH7971> out your light <WH216> and your truth: <WH571> let them lead <WH5148> me; let them bring <WH935> me to your holy <WH6944> hill, <WH2022> and to your tabernacles. <WH4908>
Then will I go <WH935> to the altar <WH4196> of God, <WH430> to God <WH410> my exceeding <WH8057> joy: <WH1524> yes, on the harp <WH3658> will I praise <WH3034> you, O God <WH430> my God. <WH430>

Why <WH4100> are you cast <WH7817> down, <WH7817> O my soul? <WH5315> and why <WH4100> are you disquieted <WH1993> within <WH5921> me? hope <WH3176> in God: <WH430> for I shall yet <WH5750> praise <WH3034> him, who is the health <WH3444> of my countenance, <WH6440> and my God. <WH430>
